topics.body:
I want a Justice League movie already.
And make it nothing like the Man of Steel one. I want something with action and laughs, not drama and angst.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5542f59063687271ec221100#post_5542f59063687271ec221100
Oh you have no idea. If my step-dad hadn't insisted on getting there when we did our seats wouldn't have been NEARLY as good.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5542f5e463687271eca21100#post_5542f5e463687271eca21100
I personally can't stand being in a crowded theater, but the crowds make me really anxious in general. I can just about handle them if I'm on the edge of one, but when I'm in the middle of one the hairs on the back of my neck stand up and I start to expect gunfire and explosions.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5542f6bd6368722ea66e0900#post_5542f6bd6368722ea66e0900
Yikes man... Y-ya wanna talk about it?
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body: Ey, sleep time, g'night.

[bq="HJSDGCE"]not drama and angst.[/bq]
No offense DC fans, but I have a nagging feeling that Superman Vs Batman is going to suck.

topics.body:
I just watched that Discover Channel program about people naked in the middle of the wild.

The woman passed out and the crew took her in the hospital.
They leave the man alone. He is scared.
topics.author: 5239db6da4c72d22d9000358

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5542f79c63687253dd700000#post_5542f79c63687253dd700000
I remain optimistic.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5542f7016368724128001000#post_5542f7016368724128001000
Nah, I'm cool. Worst that happens is I get uncomfortable and nervous and want to leave as soon as possible. As soon as I get away from the crowd and have a drink or a smoke I calm down just fine.

I worry about my bros.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5542f79c63687253dd700000#post_5542f79c63687253dd700000
I do not doubt this at all. Nothing I've heard about that movie has instilled any faith at all and on top of that Man of Steel left a terrible taste in my mouth.

Its sad that I'm more looking forward to the fucking Fantastic 4 movie than this one, and I goddamn hate the Fantastic 4.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5542f82d6368724adc6c0400#post_5542f82d6368724adc6c0400
I appreciate it dude. Honestly its something I'm so used to that it didn't even occur to me that it'd freak anyone out.

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5542f8436368724f2e2d0900#post_5542f8436368724f2e2d0900
Reason why the new superman sucks summarized:
!http://ak-hdl.buzzfed.com/static/enhanced/webdr03/2013/6/17/15/enhanced-buzz-21459-1371498261-20.jpg!
He's less of superman and more of if michael bay was given superpowers.

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5542f80563687271ec6f1500#post_5542f80563687271ec6f1500
She suffered dehydration.
She is fine now, but is to dangerous to continue in the program.
Yep, the naked man is completely alone.
topics.author: 5239db6da4c72d22d9000358

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5542f89d6368722ea6370c00#post_5542f89d6368722ea6370c00
I can kinda see what they were going for with that actually. Trying to show what sort of damage would actually be done in a knock down drag out super fight.

The problem is that the movie in no way whatsoever earned that.

I can tell you exactly where that fucking film lost me and all chance of getting me back on its side, and it is where Pa Kent has the single dumbest, most meaningless sacrifice I've ever seen in a movie.

Anyone who's seen it knows what I'm talking about.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5542f8b76368722ea65e0c00#post_5542f8b76368722ea65e0c00
Poor ol' naked man.

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5542f89d6368722ea6370c00#post_5542f89d6368722ea6370c00
See, this is why I'm afraid.
Avengers made less damage than Superman did and they were a _team_.

I lost it when Pa Kent implied that he'd rather have Clark let a bus full of CHILDREN die so his son didn't show his powers.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5542fa4b63687246fb0b0000#post_5542fa4b63687246fb0b0000
Unlike _some_ people. I didn't catch the day _0_ of the movie.
!https://38.media.tumblr.com/2870b019b75e1f408adab0c3220b451d/tumblr_nnbq626Auo1sfay15o4_r1_250.gif!

Or you guys can just make a thread

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5542fa0e6368724128b61400#post_5542fa0e6368724128b61400
Pa Kent is one cruel fellow.
He can't judge when the world was ready. Nobody can tell when the world was ready for anything. We speculate, but it may or may not be right.

We weren't ready for any war but we survived.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
